name: Mixed Guns
description:
In Mixed Guns you play as a dude that for some reason is going to commit manslaughter on a local mercenary team, along the way you will find modern and medival weapons and mix them togheter

This game was created for Mix and Jam Game Jam

theme for which was "MIXING GENRES"

Music Used:

Jungle by T1LTED

Controlls: Move: A,D / Left,Right Jump: Space Bar  Aim: Use Mouse  Shoot: LMB   Switch Weapons: Number Keys
